content: tiny feet booties welcome to my knitting pattern guide age 0-3 months sole length 2 75-3 35 inches 7-8 5 cm shoe size us 0-0 5 uk 0-0 5 eu 15-15 5 yarn needles us 1 1/2 uk 13 eu 2 5 mm lana grossa meilenweit 4 ply gauge 16 sts and 18 row for 5x5 cm / 80 % virgin wool superwash 2x2 inches in stockinette/stocking 20 % polyamid stitch 100 g = 420 m 3 1/2 oz = 459 yds notions dpns stitch marker crochet colour 07907 lot 41691 hook tapestry needle -1- abbreviations the back loop k - knit tbl - through the back loop p - purl wyif - with yarn in front st - stitch sl1k - s lip 1 knitwise sts - stitches sl1p - slip 1 purwise sl - slip k1 tbl - knit 1 through the back loop k2tog - knit 2 together sl1 wyif - slip 1 with yarn in front p2tog - purl 2 together sl1 wyib - slip 1 with yarn in back ssk - slip slip knit slip 2 stitches knitwise rs - right side knit the 2 slipped stitches together through ws wrong side pattern cuff cast on 36 + 1 st to join in the round divide the sts onto four needles rounds 1-15 work in 2x2 rib stitch heel flap divide your sts evenly 18 sts for the heel flap 18 sts for the sole work back and forth knit 12 row for the heel flap work the heel flap in stockinette/stocking stitch k all on the rs p all on the ws heel turn work with short row row 1 rs knit to the exact centre of the heel then k1 ssk k1 turn row 2 ws sl1 p3 p2 decrease p1 turn row 3 rs sl1 k until you get to 1 st before the gap ssk k1 turn row 4 ws sl1 p until you get 1 st before the gap p2 decrease p1 turn repeat row 3-4 until you have all your sts used up after using up all your sts you should be again at the beginning of the round gusset knit to the end of the heel flap and pick up sts along the left side of the heel flap as many stitches as many „v shaped edge sts you find at the edge it should be 8 sts start working the first row of the instep continue in 2x2 rib stitch knit the knits and purl the purls the sole knitted in stockinette/stocking stitch k all continue with picking up sts on the right side too make sure you have the same number of sts on both sides 8-8 sts -2- you have to decrease your newly picked up sts on the side needles after and before the instep work in the round and make two decreases in each round until you have your original number of stitches left leaning decreases ssk right leaning decreases k2 decrease continue
